trans-unit.source: Exception class to indicate that the policy supplied by the recipient could not be validated.
trans-unit.target: 指示接收方所提供的策略无法验证的异常类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> class.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> class.
The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 属性初始化为系统提供的消息，该消息描述错误并考虑当前系统区域性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should also be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 该消息的内容也应该是用户可以理解的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 保存有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> class with serialization information and streaming context specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化信息和流上下文初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
